name: Subject 793
description:
"HELLO 793, AND WELCOME INTO EXISTENCE"

You play as a bot undergoing standard testing, supervised by an AI. However, your ability to problem solve is far above what should be possible...

THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS, AND HAS BEEN RELEASED UNDER TIME PRESSURE FOR ACORN JAM #1

This is also the first game in which I have tried to introduce some sort of narrative, so forgive me if the story does not flow quite as well as it should, and feel free to give me suggestions.
